body:
Hello, 

I guess that you used the pretrained model TRBA (TPS-ResNet-BiLSTM-Attn.pth).

Actually, that total_accuracy score is higher than our paper (our paper's total_accuracy is 84.0, see [our paper's supplementary, Table 8](https://arxiv.org/abs/1904.01906)).
Notice that, in our paper, the total accuracy is calculated by the results of IIIT, SVT, IC03_867, IC13_1015, IC15_2077, SVTP, and CUTE80, and the total accuracy is 85.057 in this case.

As you said, some datasets (IIIT5k, SVT, IC13_857, IC13_1015) are lower than our paper, while other datasets (IC03_860, IC03_867, IC15_1811, IC15_2077, SP, CT) are better than our paper. 

The possible reasons are below. 
1) In the paper, we have run five trials with different initialization random seeds and have averaged their accuracies. 
We uploaded only one model which has better than average total_accuracy 84.0.

2) In this repository, we used [batch balance training](https://github.com/clovaai/deep-text-recognition-benchmark/blob/master/dataset.py#L17), which usually results in better accuracy.

3) The different versions of libraries such as PyTorch version could result in slightly different accuracy.

Hope it helps :)

Best
